name: FRED
talkMsg: How could you lose the spaceship? It's giant.
lookMsg: He sort of looks like a newt.
attackMsg: I, Fred, will knock you all down.

name: MECHANIC
talkMsg: If I was working on your spaceship, you would have a work order. No order, no work.
lookMsg: A crusty MECHANIC that is organizing his garage.

name: PILOT
talkMsg: I can't let you hitch a ride. You're clearly unprepared for the travel.
specialMsg: Ahh, I see you have a TOWEL. You're clearly a person to be reckoned with. Of course you can hitch a ride to the MOON BASE.

name: GEORGE
talkMsg: Fred told me you were searching for a lost spaceship. We have a new access code 24601.
lookMsg: He looks significantly less newt-esque than his brother. Maybe he got better.
attackMsg: Good? Bad? I'm the guy with the gun.

name: SALESMAN
talkMsg: Do you have a NUMBER? No number, no ticket. According to the rules I just made up.
lookMsg: A bored SALESMAN that appears to have previously worked at the DMV.
attackMsg: Me and ol' double barrel here will blow your butts to kingdom come!! See if we don't!
specialMsg:
After what seems like an eternity (in reality it was about 3 minutes you impatient jerk), you go up to the booth and the SALESMAN gives you your TICKET.
You can now talk to the EMPLOYEE in the next room to board the flight.

name: EMPLOYEE
talkMsg: You're not getting on this flight without a TICKET.
specialMsg: No sympathy for the devil; keep that in mind. Buy the TICKET and take the ride. Get on the flight! We're about to take off to the MARS BASE.

name: ROBOT
attackMsg: The rules say 'A robot may not injure a human being or, through inaction, allow a human being to come to harm'--but rules are meant to be broken!!!

name: CREEPER
talkMsg: You killed my father. Prepare to die.
lookMsg: He's a CREEPER who has taken up residence in your spaceship.
